title: Gay nightclub dancer Ciarran Stott wows Bachelorette Angie Kent by stripping NUDE
text:
He finally told Angie Kent about his past performing as a dance in a gay bar on Wednesday night's episode of The Bachelorette.

And in a trailer for Thursday night's episode, the British heartthrob sets the blonde beauty's heart pulsing by posing completely nude during a hens-themed group date.

Ciarran, 25, proudly bares all in front of Angie, her Gogglebox pal Yvie Jones, and his rivals - with Angie admitting she is impressed by the raunchy display.

'I was speechless. It was the best!' Gay nightclub dancer Ciarran Stott wows Bachelorette Angie Kent (Pictured with Gogglebox co-star Yvie Jones) by stripping NUDE on group date

In the clip, the former Army rifleman models nude during a life drawing class portion of the date.

Showing off his confidence and cheeky personality, Ciarran is seen flexing his muscles and turning to show off his backside to the group.

Angie appears to get flustered in the promotional video, saying: 'I was speechless. I had no idea where to look. I couldn't look. It was the best!'

Meanwhile, Ciarran's male co-stars laughed and cheered on their rival in a display of good sportsmanship and support.

'I was speechless. I had no idea where to look. I couldn't look. It was the best!' Angie appears to get flustered in the promotional video as she recounts the moment he dropped his robe

He's not shy! Showing off his confidence and cheeky personality, Ciarran is seen flexing his muscles and turning to show off his backside to the group

The Manchester-born reality star, who twerked for Angie during the first cocktail party, revealed his raunchy past as a dancer earlier that week.

In 2016, Ciarran regularly performed on stage in skimpy underwear alongside drag queens at Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb.

He even starred in a Christmas show called 'Camp Christmas: Freezn', which was inspired by the Disney movie Frozen.

Elsa, where are you? Ciarran (left) is certainly no stranger to the spotlight, with a raunchy past performing in Darwin's leading gay nightclub, Throb

'That's a bit creepy': Elsewhere in the trailer for Thursday's episode, Angie (R) is left less-than-impressed by firefighter Jamie Doran's (middle) attempt to woo her

Elsewhere in the trailer for Thursday's episode, Angie is left less-than-impressed by another suitor's bid for her attention.

Firefighter Jamie Doran, 39, is seen approaching Angie during a one-on-one with another contestant at the cocktail party, as he says: 'This is going to sound like bit of a curve-ball...'

Hinting that his comment does not go well with Angie, she says: 'That's a bit creepy.'

The Bachelorette airs Wednesday and Thursday nights from 7.30pm on Channel 10
description: On Wednesday night's episode of The Bachelorette, Ciarran Stott told Angie Kent about his past performing as a dance in a gay bar. And on Thursday, he will strip NUDE for the blonde.
authors: Candice Jackson For Daily Mail Australia
